column2: and keep waiting for it to suck since it's so popular. It does not suck. My hubby got the full slab
column4: 1/2 baby back. I always get the pulled pork. Just really good. Simple
column5: nice and smoky. Good balance on the ribs of not TOO falling off the bone
column6: but a nice chew. I like the fries. Some reviewers have called 'em mushy
column8: and there's a hint of black pepper on them. Really yum.
